data.text: @SmartyPants_USA I don't have to wear a mask anymore but I still do..In public or in a closed in area with people ,it's just common sense
@ladyvictoria8 And if people ask why are you still wearing a 😷 I just say it's because the idiots want their freeDUMB.
@SmartyPants_USA I don't think PennDot would do anything but you can try..
@ladyvictoria8 I saw a flag they left behind on the overpass and am still tempted to call PennDOT to see if they got a permit 😁

@marythetrainer Isn't that the truth!tSome have stopped,gone home.I saw a woman in Ukraine holding her baby that has a tumor in it's brain .She was in the basement of a hospital b/c bombing over her city and these idiots complain because they have to wear a friggin mask .
@ladyvictoria8 Oh gawd, are they headed my way? If these people want to protest injustice, why don't they head to Moscow?
